title: Flight Simulator 2020 - How to - Boeing 737-700 - remove the default pushback truck
description:
As you might have find out already PMDG decided to include multiple vehicles as part of their Boeing 737-700 including a pushback truck. This is really nice and shows how much time is being performed on creating a high quality aircraft but there is one issue ... The default pushback truck is still in place which results in weird scenarios. Based on this I checked the PMDG forum and found a solution posted by Wonderboy:

https://forum.pmdg.com/forum/main-forum/pmdg-737-for-msfs/186117-guide-how-remove-default-asobo-pushback-truck

So all credits for Wonderboy for coming with this solution. In this video I will show you what you need to change and the results of that change.

If you also want to give the aircraft a try you can download it from the site below:
https://pmdg.com/pmdg-737-700-for-microsoft-flight-simulator/
